about_the_game:
Feeling nostalgic? Need a little blast from the past in your wardrobe? Then Neil's Jacket for STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town might be the perfect fit for you! This stunning crimson attire makes you want to spend a peaceful day taking care of your animals...and hoping that no one bothers you.

To equip this item in-game, examine the wardrobe in your house or the fitting room in the salon.

* The protagonist outfits will become available once you have completed the town development request to build the salon. You may then commission the outfits from Karina.
* All protagonist outfits can be worn regardless of gender chosen.

To equip this item in-game, examine the wardrobe in your house or the fitting room in the salon.

* The protagonist outfits will become available once you have completed the town development request to build the salon. You may then commission the outfits from Karina.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8265U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
